review: I think the concept of Chromecast is a great solution for those without Smart TVs. It works well and I like how I can use it with my iPad. It's downfall is the lack of services (currently only YouTube, NetFlix, and they finally added Hulu). Once they add HBO GO and other such services, it'll be a  must-have.
author: Dan the Creator

review: I waited for the Chromecast to be delivered (it was on back order) for a couple of months.It works great for Netflix and Youtube but there aren't enough apps that support it.Chrome on the iPhone / iPad doesn't support it. COME ON GOOGLE!I'll be using my Apple TV and X-Box 360 until the Chromecast improves - it has a long way to go!

review: The product description leads you to believe you can stream or "cast" your Chrome browser content from any device.  You cannot cast from Apple iPad (not browser content).  I was able to stream from the YouTube and Netflix apps.  Was disappointed as I hoped it was my solution to put my tablet web browser content onto the big screen.  Was able to cast Chrome content from my laptop, however.
